EmailTemplate.subject: TBC Ignite 2014 - Last Few Tickets Remaining!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don’t forget to sign up for the The Black Country Ignite event!
Due to high demand, almost all the tickets have gone – don’t miss your chance to be there! There are very few tickets remaining!
Sign up directly on the Eventbrite website using this link:
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ignite-black-country-2014-tickets-12867010575
If you have signed up already you do not need to do it again!
Choose Ignite!
Ignite! - 29th November - 12pm - 5.15pm - Wolverhampton Wanderers Football Club
Your future - Your choice
Every person attending will be entered into a prize draw!
Reunite with NCS graduates from across The Black Country area for a day of interactive and fun workshops based around exploring, developing and assessing your next steps in life.
The Black Country team will be contacting those who have registered their place shortly.
